tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP$ My) (NN house) (NN area)) (VP (VBZ is) (VP (VBN flooded) (PP (IN like) (NP (DT a) (S (VP (VB swallow))) (NN pool))))) (: :) (: /)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [flooded/VBN nsubjpass>[area/NN nmod:poss>My/PRP$ compound>house/NN] auxpass>is/VBZ nmod:like>[pool/NN case>like/IN det>a/DT dep>swallow/VB] punct>:/: punct>//:]
